item.title: Decision Support Systems Engineer -- Consultant Needed (campbell)
item.description:
Decision Support Systems Engineer
Contract Position

ABOUT US
DVDPlay is the creator and manufacturer of the worlds first fully automated and remotely managed DVD rental machine. Operated exclusively by credit or debit card, there are no application forms to complete, no clerks to pay and no cash to collect. Rental transactions take less than a minute. The entire system is simple, secure and easy to use. Our kiosks reside in the supermarkets you shop in, and business is booming!

ABOUT THE JOB
DVDPlay is seeking a passionate, team-oriented, and self-motivated engineer to analyze access and usage patterns of DVDPlay's kiosks and online services utilizing data mining techniques, in-depth knowledge of logs processing, databases and OLAP technologies to enhance DVDDPlay's understanding of key markets and customers. You will work with huge data sets, write scripts to automate data extraction, test business and product hypotheses, and build monitoring/reporting dashboards utilizing state of the art technologies including AJAX. This position will also be responsible for tool building, both in terms of the backend (e.g., database) as well as front-end (e.g., web tools).

QUALIFICATIONS
 B.S. degree in technical discipline. MS preferred.
 Experience in scripting in a major scripting language such as Perl, PHP, Ruby
 Experience with DHTML, JavaScript, AJAX, PHP5, FLASH and other web technologies desired (for building automated reports/dashboards).
 Strong understanding of databases, data warehouses, statistical methods and tools, internet architecture, and web services.
 Database query experience, 5+ years hands-on experience with MySQL/PostgreSQL in the following areas:
o Replication
o Load balancing
o Query optimization
o Schema design
o Disaster recovery
 Experience with statistical data analysis and statistical tools strongly preferred.
 Experience programming software in C++, Java, PHP, Ruby
 Solid understanding of UNIX/Linux operating systems.
 Excellent written and oral communication skills.
 High energy, strong team player.
 Demonstrated experience in working with broad cross-functional teams
 Ability to work cooperatively with software engineers and system administrators.
 Exceptional problem-solving expertise and attention to detail.
 Superb self-management skills.
 Strong oral and written communication skills.
 Aptitude for documentation, innovation and process improvement.

Send your resume and rate requirement to play@dvdplay.com
